script.description: Transforms DTBook XML into ZedAI XML.

input.desc: One or more DTBook files to be transformed. In the case of multiple files, a merge will be performed.
input.name: source

option.desc: Filename for the generated ZedAI file
option.name: zedai-filename

option.desc: Whether to stop processing and raise an error on validation issues.
option.name: assert-valid

option.desc: The directory to store the generated files in.
option.name: output-dir

option.desc: Filename for the generated MODS file
option.name: mods-filename

option.desc: Language code of the input document.
option.name: lang

option.desc: Filename for the generated CSS file
option.name: css-filename
